reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Surveillance, Detection and Management of Citrus Greening Disease Workshop

description.narrative: Note: This activity is tentatively planned and may be delayed due to the ongoing COVID-19 situation. This workshop aims to increase regional capacity to combat the spread of citrus greening in southern Africa and includes training in surveillance, response, and management for entomologists, plant pathologists and industry stakeholders. The workshop is also intended to bolster communication between relevant stakeholders, so that information related to citrus greening, and other emerging pests and diseases, can be more effectively shared. Slowing and limiting the spread of both the pathogen and its insect vector will result in more favorable outcomes for commercial and smallholder citrus producers.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

participating-org.usg:office-name: Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: South Africa continues to be an important strategic partner of the United States. Although it is the second largest economy in Africa, South Africa struggles with serious socioeconomic challenges, including HIV/AIDS and other health concerns, mass unemployment, a failing education system, increasing corruption, poor accountability, and critical levels of violent crime. As South Africa continues to exert leadership in the region, it is working with the United States and other donors to address its social and economic challenges. U.S. investments, in line with South African national development priorities, will target efforts where funding can catalyze innovative approaches for reform and improve efficiency, helping South Africa sustain its democracy and improve the lives of its people

usg:treasury-account.usg:main-account: Agricultural Quarantine Inspection User Fee Account, Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service
